hudson.tasks.Shell.command: cat /dev/null > ~/.ssh/known_hosts cd /Users/jonmarinello/mrsc/development/rightscale/repos/virtualmonkey/ cat collateral/servertemplate_tests/updatedTroops/troop_01.json bin/monkey create -f collateral/servertemplate_tests/updatedTroops/troop_01.json -x test01_AWS_West_Ubuntu_007_troop_01__test_XX -i 33 -o Ubuntu --yes bin/monkey run -f collateral/servertemplate_tests/updatedTroops/troop_01.json -x test01_AWS_West_Ubuntu_007_troop_01__test_XX -t "test_XX" -r -u "booting_timeout=1201" "completed_timeout=1201" "default_timeout=1201" "error_timeout=1201" "failed_timeout=1201" "inactive_timeout=1201" "operational_timeout=1201" "snapshot_timeout=1201" "stopped_timeout=1201" "terminated_timeout=1201" -v --yes
